title: To Kill a Mockingbird
summary: The unforgettable novel of a childhood in a sleepy Southern town and the crisis of conscience that rocked it.
A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the dangers of totalitarianism.

title: The Great Gatsby
summary: The story of the mysteriously wealthy Jay Gatsby and his love for the beautiful Daisy Buchanan.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
summary: A story about adolescent alienation and loss of innocence in the protagonist Holden Caulfield.

title: The Hobbit
summary: A fantasy novel about the adventures of a hobbit named Bilbo Baggins.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
summary: The first book in the Harry Potter series, which follows Harry as he discovers his magical heritage.

title: Pride and Prejudice
summary: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist Elizabeth Bennet.

title: The Diary of a Young Girl
summary: The diary of Anne Frank, a Jewish girl hiding from the Nazis in World War II.

title: The Book Thief
summary: A historical novel about a young girl in Nazi Germany who finds solace by stealing books.

title: The Lord of the Rings
summary: An epic high-fantasy novel about the quest to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Shining
summary: A horror novel about a family staying in an isolated hotel for the winter.

title: The Hunger Games
summary: A dystopian novel set in a future where the government stages an annual event in which children fight to the death.

title: Gone Girl
summary: A psychological thriller about a man whose wife goes missing on their fifth wedding anniversary.

title: The Help
summary: A novel about African American maids working in white households in Jackson, Mississippi, during the early 1960s.

title: The Alchemist
summary: A philosophical novel about a shepherd boy named Santiago who dreams of finding treasure in the Egyptian pyramids.

title: Life of Pi
summary: A novel about a boy stranded on a lifeboat with a Bengal tiger.

title: The Road
summary: A post-apocalyptic novel about a father and son journeying through a desolate America.

title: Memoirs of a Geisha
summary: A novel about a young Japanese girl sold into slavery and trained as a geisha.

title: The Kite Runner
summary: A story about a young boy from Afghanistan and his journey of redemption.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
summary: A psychological thriller about a journalist and a computer hacker investigating a disappearance.
